name: Inception
description: A mind-bending thriller where dreams are the ultimate frontier. Dom Cobb, a skilled thief, is given a chance to erase his criminal past by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets.

name: Titanic
description: A timeless love story set on the ill-fated Titanic, where Jack and Rose, two lovers from different worlds, must survive the catastrophic sinking of the legendary ship.

name: The Dark Knight
description: A gritty and intense tale of Gothamâ€™s protector, Batman, as he faces his greatest enemy yet, the Joker, who seeks to create chaos and destruction in the city.

name: Avatar
description: A visually stunning adventure set in the alien world of Pandora, where a paraplegic Marine finds himself torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels connected to.

name: The Matrix
description: In a world where reality is an illusion, Neo discovers that he is the prophesied savior of humanity, destined to free humankind from a simulated existence created by machines.

name: Forrest Gump
description: Follow the extraordinary life of Forrest Gump, a simple man with good intentions, who inadvertently influences historical events in America, all while chasing his lifelong love, Jenny.

name: The Lord of the Rings
description: An epic journey begins as Frodo Baggins, a hobbit, embarks on a quest to destroy the One Ring, which holds the power to control the entire world of Middle-Earth.

name: The Godfather
description: The saga of the Corleone crime family, where power, loyalty, and betrayal shape the lives of those at the center of the Italian-American mafia under the patriarch Vito Corleone.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: Intertwining stories of crime and redemption in Los Angeles, featuring a boxer, two hitmen, and a gangster's wife, all delivered in a unique non-linear narrative.

name: Harry Potter
description: The magical adventures of Harry Potter as he navigates through the world of wizards, battling dark forces while attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

name: The Fault In Our Stars
description: A touching love story about two people from different backgrounds who fall in love and their struggle to stay together despite all odds.

name: Avengers:Endgame
description: The Avengers,Earth's mightiest heroes come together to fight against and fights to protect the world from the ultimate THREAT.

name: Avengers:Infinity War
description: Earth's mightiest heroes, the Avengers, come together to fight against threats that no single hero can face, defending the planet from extraterrestrial forces.

name: The Chronicles of Narnia
description: Four siblings discover a magical world called Narnia and join forces with its inhabitants to battle the White Witch and restore peace to the land.
